Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1979...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Los Angeles on 3/2/1979 (Going to CHC: C R. Seilheimer. Going to LA: 2B J. Ray, C B. Schroeder)...
Injured on 4/3/1979 with a Fractured Knee, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/15/1980 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/20/1983 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 9/8/1983 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 5/11/1984, off Joaquin Andujar (STL)...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (N) on 1/31/1985 (Going to LA: RF D. Strawberry. Going to NYM: C G. Carter, CF K. Yamamoto, 2B J. Ray)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Hit first career homerun on 7/23/1987, off Dave Rozema (CHC)...
